toneOptions.label: Formal
toneOptions.example: Dear Sir/Madam, I am writing to inform you about the recent updates to our policy. Please review the attached document for detailed information. Sincerely, [Your Name]

toneOptions.label: Informal
toneOptions.example: Hey there! Just wanted to let you know about the new policy updates. Check out the attached doc for all the details. Cheers, [Your Name]

toneOptions.label: Friendly
toneOptions.example: Hi there! Hope you're doing well. I wanted to share some updates about our policy. Please take a look at the attached document. Best, [Your Name]
